articles.content: Larsen & Toubro Ltd. shares fell 6% on Thursday, a day after the company reported better-than-estimated fourth-quarter results. It is also the first time in the last seven quarters, in between re… [+805 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Gainers and Losers: 10 stocks that moved the most on May 9 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: All sectors except auto ended in the red. Nifty Auto gained 0.78 percent and was the biggest gainer while Nifty Energy was the biggest loser falling 2.97 percent. India VIX climbed to 18.2, its highest level since October 2022.
articles.content: Markets had the biggest fall since January 23 as the Nifty was down 345.00 points or 1.55 percent at 21,957.50. Sensex tanked 1,062.22 points or 1.45 percent at 72,404.17. About 891 shares advanced, … [+3503 chars]

articles.author: Anshul
articles.title: PNB Q4 results: Net profit surges 160%, lender announces highest dividend payout in nine years - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Punjab National Bank's gross non-performing assets (NPA) ratio stood at 5.73%, as against 6.24% a quarter ago, and 8.74% last year.
articles.content: Punjab National Bank (PNB) has reported a 160% surge to 3,010.27 crore in its net profit for the fourth quarter of the financial year 2023-24. The bank's performance can be attributed to several key … [+1456 chars]
